colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the slider.

filledTrackColor.description: The CSS `color` property. Used in `color` of filled track element.

filledTrackProps.description: Props for slider filled track element.

focusThumbOnChange.description: If `false`, the slider handle will not capture focus when value changes.

id.description: The base `id` to use for the slider.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

isReversed.description: If `true`, the value will be incremented or decremented in reverse.

max.description: The maximum allowed value of the slider. Cannot be less than min.

min.description: The minimum allowed value of the slider. Cannot be greater than max.

name.description:
The name attribute of the hidden `input` field.
This is particularly useful in forms.

onChange.description: Function called whenever the slider value changes.

onChangeEnd.description: Function called when the user is done selecting a new value.

onChangeStart.description: Function called when the user starts selecting a new value.

step.description: The step in which increments or decrements have to be made.

thumbColor.description: The CSS `background` property. Used in `background` of thumb element.

thumbSize.description: The CSS `box-size` property. Used in `box-size` of thumb element.

trackColor.description: The CSS `color` property. Used in `color` of track element.

trackSize.description: The CSS `height` property. Used in `height` of track element.

filledTrackProps.description: Props for slider filled track element.

betweenThumbs.description:
The minimum distance between slider thumbs.
Useful for preventing the thumbs from being too close together.
